title: Culturally Responsive Science Education Online Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and basic online learning skills
context.additional_context: For In-Service Secondary Science Teachers: Requires Experience Guiding Multinational Students, Utilizing Collaborative Tools in LMS

learning_goals: Learners can develop science teaching and learning materials that reflect diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can implement discussion designs that promote intercultural interaction in online environments
Learners can create and operate formative assessment tools that account for cultural differences
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
